import React, { useState } from 'react' import './restaurants.css' function Restaurants() { const restaurants=[{ name: "Mothers's Kitchen", deliveryTime: '30 minutes', relevance: 4, rating: 4, cost:"200", description:'North Indian, South Indian', image:"https://images.pexels.com/photos/1640772/pexels-photo-1640772.jpeg?cs=srgb&dl=pexels-ella-olsson-1640772.jpg&fm=jpg" }, { name: 'Zam Zam Hotel', deliveryTime: '25 minutes', relevance: 5, rating: 4.5, cost:"150", description:'Chinese, North indian,South Indian', image:'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR7ZQweZXJuwPizDP_oV1Qg27jrme9FQ9IXBw&usqp=CAUg' }, { name: 'The Imperial Kitchen', deliveryTime: '31 minutes', relevance: 5, rating: 4.2, cost:"500", description:'Chinese, North indian,South Indian', image:'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS5dAG2vG0JeLl3OyKe6zEolYkZ-J42xFka7Q&usqp=CAU' }, ] const [getFilter,setGetFilter]=useState('') const filterRestaurants=(getFilter)=>{ } return (

373 restaurants

{restaurants.map((restautent=>{ return(

{restautent.name}

{restautent.description}

{restautent.rating}
{restautent.deliveryTime} 200 fOR TWO
) }))}
) } export default Restaurants
